name: Cappuccino
description: A classic Italian coffee drink made with espresso, steamed milk, and milk foam. Standard coffee drink in Italy.

name: Espresso
description: A strong and concentrated coffee brewed by forcing hot water through finely-ground coffee beans.

name: Latte
description: A creamy coffee drink made with espresso and steamed milk, often topped with a small amount of milk foam.

name: Americano
description: A simple coffee drink made by diluting espresso with hot water, resulting in a similar strength to brewed coffee.

name: Chocolate chip cookies
description: A cookie that featureing chips of chocolate as its main ingredient.

name: Ginger Snaps
description: Also known as ginger nuts or ginger biscuits, these spicy treats are popular all around the world.

name: Shortbread Cookies
description: Shortbread cookies have a very high ratio of butter or shortening to flour, hence the name short.

name: Peanut Butter Cookies
description: As the name suggests, a favorite for all the peanut butter lovers.

name: Coca Cola
description: Known as the most well-known soft drink brand in the U.S., recognized by 95% of internet respondents.

name: Diet Coke
description: A popular diet version of Coca-Cola, with less sugar and significant market share. Best for people on diet

name: Sprite
description: A lemon-lime flavored soft drink, popular for its refreshing taste.

name: Fanta
description: A brand of fruit-flavored soft drinks, known for its colorful packaging and diverse flavors

name: Croissant
description: Known for their crescent shape and delicate, feature flaky layers made from dough.

name: Danish Pastry
description: Tender, flaky layers and delicious fillings such as fruit, cream cheese, or almond paste.

name: Strudel
description: Austrian pastry, strudel features its, flaky layers of dough around a sweet filling, such as apples.

name: Donut
description: From classic glazed to frosted varieties, donuts never disappoint of all ages

name: Bread
description: Nothing quite like the smell of a freshly baked bagel to whet customers appetites

name: Cakes
description: Something that wouldn't look out of place on a special occasion like birthdays

name: Lime & Blistered Peanut Coleslaw
description: This light, mayo-free recipe uses peanuts, tomatoes, and lime

name: Cucumber Salad
description: A refreshing chopped cucumber salad loaded with peanuts, spices, toasted coconut, and chiles.

name: Good Shredded Salad
description: A vibrant mix of finely cut, crisp vegetables and often fruits, highlight their fresh flavors.
